Specific Details: Representation to Fianna Fáil in South Dublin County Council.

Subject Matter: Representation to Fianna Fáil in South Dublin County Council.
Intended Results: To promote long-term planning and high-density residential development.::To promote investment in sustainable transport infrastructure.::To prevent increases in commercial rates and excessive downward variations in LPT.::To support the work of Local Enterprise Offices.
Lobbying Activities: Dublin Chamber's Local Elections manifesto was shared with DPOs. Specific Details: Communication with Cllr Shane Moynihan on the 15 Minute City
Subject Matter: Communication with Cllr Shane Moynihan on the 15 Minute City
Intended Results: To highlight the urban planning vision of Dublin as 15 Minute City.::To encourage a pilot programme of a 15 Minute City to be established in Dublin.::To encourage the 15 Minute City to be included in future development plans and planning policy.

Specific Details: Every year the Parish ask South Dublin County Council to trim the hedges around the church grounds, because they trim hedges in the neighbouring estate.
Subject Matter: Every year the Parish ask South Dublin County Council to trim the hedges around the church grounds, because they trim hedges in the neighbouring estate.
Intended Results: To trim hedges in the Parish
